name: TRECKED PTY LTD
about: TRECKED PTY LTD flying school is a premier aviation training institution dedicated to nurturing the next generation of pilots. Located in a unique and less congested airspace, our school offers an ideal environment for both recreational and professional flight training. Our experienced and passionate instructors guide students every step of the way, ensuring a comprehensive understanding of aviation principles and safety procedures. With a focus on efficiency and excellence, our programs are designed to take students from zero flight time to certified pilots in a short and structured timeframe. We provide access to advanced aviation training devices and a diverse fleet of aircraft, ensuring hands-on experience and practical skills. At TRECKED PTY LTD, we are committed to launching successful aviation careers and fostering a community of skilled and resilient pilots. Join us to turn your passion for flying into a rewarding career.
services:
["Low Level Ratings
Sling Endorsements
